actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for dismissal of any officer or employee of the Federal Bureau of Investigation who impersonates an officer or employee of the Bureau of the Census.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Requires the dismissal of any officer or employee of the Federal Bureau of Investigation who represents himself in the performance of duties to be an officer or employee of the Bureau of the Census.

titles.title: A bill to provide for dismissal of any officer or employee of the Federal Bureau of Investigation who impersonates an officer or employee of the Bureau of the Census.
